name: Are We There Yet? (itch) (Let's Talk Game Design)
name_original: Are We There Yet? (itch) (Let's Talk Game Design)
description:
Entry for the 47th Ludum Dare Competition, under competition rules. 

This bit's going to be very sparse, because it's nearly 11PM and I haven't submitted my game yet. So I'll come back and edit this later?

Or I might not. I think the game's kinda self-explanatory, so I might just leave this as it is.
